column5: Latest;Prey Nob District: Aquaculture and fisheries were severely affected by the Cyclone Noul.------Flooding caused fish and crabs to disappear

column11: 200 rock crabs were washed away in Toek Laak commune.------Flooding around freshwater aquaculture sites has resulted in the disappearance of a number of fish

column21: 300 fish in Ochrov commune.------Some of the missing fish were caught and eaten by the villagers
